#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define l long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define ii pair<int,int>
#define x first
#define y second

/*
	replace endl with

*/

char s[5000009];
int z[5000009];
int main()
{
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    scanf("%s",s);int n=strlen(s);
    int q;scanf("%d",&q);

    int L,R;L=0,R=0;
    for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        if(i>R)
        {
            L=i;R=i;
            while(R<n&&s[R-L]==s[R])R++;z[i]=R-L;
            R--;
        }
        else
        {
            int k=i-L;
            if(z[k]<R-i+1)z[i]=z[k];
            else
            {
                L=i;
                while(R<n&&s[R-L]==s[R])R++;z[i]=R-L;
                R--;
            }
        }
    }
    while(q--)
    {
        int a;scanf("%d",&a);
        printf("%d\n",min(z[a],a));
    }
}
